评论概述: This is an adorable comfy t-shirt dress
评论详情: I really like this soft t-shirt type material dress. Order true to size or size down for a more fitted dress. I wanted big and roomy. Got xxl and it's perfect. Normal size is 18/20 42dd bra, big belly. Lots of free flowing extra space in the belly area. The only issue is the white is see thru and you can see the darker color under garments. So wear nude under garments and it should be fine. It is a little warmer since it is like t-shirt material but still a good comfy summer dress.

评论详情: Was tight, not a loose fit at all, and was sheer enough that could see through both layers of fabric when holding it up. Material was also scratchy. Bought 3 of them, was definitely a terrible mistake.
This dress is pretty AND comfy.  It said dry clean only....but I've washed it several times now and seems fine.

I love the stark contrast of the rainbow against the black. The fabric is smooth and soft and the fit is great. I'm 5'6" and 250# right now and it fits great but I know it will still fit well as more weight comes off. Washes and dries well too.

评论概述: Pockets are odd but I'm short (I bought XL and XXL)
评论详情: So, I'm only 5' 1.5" tall, and just under 200 lbs.  I bought this XL and an XXL (which was way too big but I'm keeping it anyway...the review here is for the XL which would be the appropriate fit, and for the color of both sizes that I got).  If these didn't have pockets (I know...most people have this huge "omg it has pockets" thing but in this case, not so much) I'd have given it a 5 star rating.  I don't know if it's because I'm short but the pockets are really low...like they're lower than where jeans pockets sit.  Also, they're not sewn correctly, so they kind of pucker at the bottom of the side seam where the pocket opening bottom is.  The positioning makes the pockets stick out.  And it's not just this one, it's both that I bought, in different colors and sizes.  I bought these as bathingsuit coverups while sitting out by a pool on a cruise, so I don't burn, so it's not a big deal, but it make me look like I have bigger thighs? Like...they stick out a bit.  The red floral color isn't see through, but the orange-black ombre kind of is.

This dress….  One of the easiest, coolest(temp-wise), and versatile dresses I’ve purchased in a while. This design looks great on a wide variety of body types. I literally brought 8 different types of this dress. Nothing but compliments!!!
This was a really pretty dress and had pockets!! Sadly it was too long for me. I am 5'3.

The color of this item was very washed out compared to the pictures.  Otherwise, it was roomy and comfortable for indoor wear.  The material makes it very hot though, so I haven't been interested in wearing it outside.
The colors are more vibrant than in the pictures and the way this dress hangs is terrific! I love the way it looks on me and the colors just pop!
Love the stretch of the fabric and how flattering it is. Has pockets. I actually bought a second one in a different color.
Very comfortable and flattering
Great dress. Love the pockets. Not too heavy of a dress. Fabric is decent. Not see thru. Cost too much for me. Fits good.

评论概述: Kinda sheer- longer than it looks!

I bought four different patterns of this dress. I had them professionally hemmed which cost me And additional $24 Each. Wore them twice and they all pilled. DO NOT BUY If I could give it a zero I would. I wish I didn’t have them hemmed because I would have I would have returned them.
I love the dress, but it was very long. I ended up hemming it up myself, because I loved the print and fit.

Fabric is soft, I expect it to wash easily, and I am just happy to have an attractive dress that I can lounge in or go out in. NICE! Why did it take so long to find a good quality casual dress??? But now I have.

I purchased this dress as I love it because of the length on 5 foot four and it goes just above my ankles, which is perfect for me. I ordered a 4X and it fits perfectly. I’m normally a 3X but I like things a little more looser and not so clingy, the fabric is excellent. The thickness is perfect. They’re see-through, which is even better and light wage which is perfect for traveling. I definitely recommend this dress I bought 4 others. The dress also does not wrinkle. You can roll it up packing in your bag and go at shake it out but it hang a little bit and it’ll be perfect.

I’m a large woman and do not usually wear dresses. Bought this as a coverup, but it fits so well and looks great, so I’ve ended up wearing it everywhere. I get a lot of compliments. Hard to find stylish clothes in the 2x -3x range, but this finally fits the bill.
Fits perfect, very soft and amazing colors.

I love how comfy the dress is. The pockets are a win! I bought it in 3 more colors after falling in love with the first one I had ordered!  The fabric is thick so nothing is see thru or showing when in sunlight or bending over to mop etc at work

It definitely has a lot of room in it and it would be comfy for hanging around the house or run into the store but it's not something I would go out to a concert in which is what I was looking for. I'm thickering the hips and belly and I am bigger on top. The 2XL fit me snugly and had a nicer shape but I would have had to wear a shaper underneath it to look smooth. So I got the 3XL to try it out but it was just too loose on me and looked more like I would say a nightgown. So not exactly what I was looking for to go out to a concert but it was comfortable feeling and if you like that style it would be perfect for you.
